alert.note: Alert for Pierce; Sheridan; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:53AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WELLS, NORTHEASTERN SHERIDAN AND SOUTH CENTRAL PIERCE COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM CDT... At 553 AM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Fessenden, or 15 miles southeast of Harvey, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Wells, northeastern Sheridan and south central Pierce Counties, including the following locations... Manfred, Chaseley, Emrick, Bremen, Heaton, Selz, Hamberg, Heimdal, Bowdon and Wellsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for south central and north central North Dakota.
